name: King Basil's Quest
description:
King Basil's Quest for the Crown of Spudly Awesomeness is originally an iPad game developed over the course of the 2014-2015 school year at the University of Southern California by a student team of about 40 people, led by Trevor Taylor and Calvin Drake. I was producer on this project.

For more information about the game and a FULL LIST OF TEAM MEMBERS, visit our website: http://www.kingbasilsquest.com
